headline: Is Albemarle (ALB) Still Attractively Priced After Its Strong 1 Year Share Price Rally
summary: If you are wondering whether Albemarle shares still offer value after a strong run, this article walks through what the current price might imply about the company. The stock last closed at US$189.51, with returns of 16.2% over 7 days, 26.3% over 30 days, 31.7% year to date, 117.9% over 1 year, a 29.7% decline over 3 years, and 23.6% over 5 years. Recent news coverage around Albemarle has focused on its role in the lithium supply chain and on market sentiment toward companies linked to...
